Àtụ:Infobox settlement
Ndoro bụ ngalaba nchịkwa, na Lindi Municipal District nke Lindi Region na Tanzania

Ngalaba a na-ekpuchi mpaghara nke1005 km2 (0.0388  ), ma nwee nkezi elu nke 25 m (82 ). Dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 2012 si guo, ngalaba ahụ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 1,836. Ngalaba Ndoro bụ ebe ụlọ ọrụ Lindi Municipal District Offices dị
